## GRID\_READY\_EVENT variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> - Use `Events.EVENT_GRID_READY` from `@ag-grid-community/core` instead
> 

Event fired when grid is ready

**Signature:**

```typescript
GRID_READY_EVENT = "onGridReady"
```
